summary: A simple mod that flips the gold coin to show the other side as the default. I got tired of seeing that ugly head and preferred the imperial symbol.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/GrantizEN/videos][img]http://i.imgbox.com/bY3cutRO[/img][/url][/center]

A simple mod that flips the gold coin to show the other side as the default. I got tired of seeing that ugly head and preferred the imperial symbol.

This simply changes the mesh so when viewed in the inventory. So textures replacers will still work.
author: Grantiz
